import {useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import { addPreference,removePreference,getPopularityListing } from "../redux/actions"; import Listing from "./Listing"; const Search = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { setCurrent("") setContent("") },[props.listings]) const updatePreference = (language) => { (language.target.checked) ? dispatch(addPreference(language.target.value)): dispatch(removePreference(language.target.value)); } return( <>

) } export default Search;
